title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: F. L.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and rose watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board
markings: On verso, upside down, a Canson and Montgolfier label.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner: F. L.; upper right corner: 496
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Square monogram comprised of an "F", the vertical element and upper horizontal black ink line superimposed upon an "L" outlined in rose watercolor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: F. L.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black ink, brush and rose watercolor, graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-93.
